title: The Life of a Cloud Packet

content:
Introduction #Good Morning, Good Afternoon, Good Evening -
This is a story of how acloudpacket.com came to life. I’ve been working in Information Technology field for the last 20+ years and have dabbled in the web many times.
First, it was to help a good friend of mine create a music site back in my days at Penn State.
